Package com.example.scandroid

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.scandroid.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an Event in the scANDROID app for CMPUT 301 at UofA W24.
Events are created by Users (as an Organizer) and attended by Users (as an Attendee).
Events are stored via an EventDB object.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(@NonNull String eventOrganizerID, @NonNull String eventName, String eventDescription, @NonNull Calendar eventDate, ArrayList<Double> eventLocation)
      Sole public constructor for an Event object, specifying spacial and temporal details as well as the name of the organizer and a poster image.
      Parameters:
      eventOrganizerID - UserID of User that created Event
      eventName - Name of Event
      eventDescription - Contextual information for Event.
      eventDate - Day that Event will take place, includes time of Event
      eventLocation - Geographical coordinates of Event {latitude, longitude}

  • Method Details

    • addEventAnnouncement

      public void addEventAnnouncement(String announcementTitle, String announcementAbout, Time announcementTime)
      Add a new announcement to an Event as an Organizer.
      Parameters:
      announcementTitle - A name for the announcement
      announcementAbout - Context to what the announcement is about
      announcementTime - The time that the announcement is visible to an attendee

    • addEventAttendee

      public void addEventAttendee(String userID, Time checkInTime, ArrayList<Double> checkInLocation)
      Add a User to an Event as an attendee if Event is not at a capacity.
      Parameters:
      userID - UserID of attendee that is checking-in to the Event
      checkInTime - The HrMin time that the attendee is checking-in
      checkInLocation - Geographical coordinates of Event {latitude, longitude}

    • addEventSignUp

      public void addEventSignUp(String userID)
      Add an attendee to the "promise to attend" list.
      Parameters:
      userID - UserID of possible attendee who promises to attend Event

    • addExistingEventAttendee

      public void addExistingEventAttendee(String userID, Time checkInTime, ArrayList<Double> checkInLocation)
      Update an attending user's location and check in time.
      Parameters:
      userID - UserID of attendee that is has already checked into the Event
      checkInTime - The HrMin time that the attendee is checking-in
      checkInLocation - Geographical coordinates of Event {latitude, longitude}

    • deleteEventCheckIn

      public void deleteEventCheckIn(String userID)
      Remove an attending user from the list of check in attendees
      Parameters:
      userID - UserID of the attendee being removed

    • deleteEventSignUp

      public void deleteEventSignUp(String userID)
      Remove a User from the sign up list of the Event.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID for User to remove from sign up list

    • packageEvent

      public Map<String,Object> packageEvent()
      Simplify Event object to hashmap to be stored in Firestore database.
      Returns:
      packaged Event object

    • unpackageEvent

      public static Event unpackageEvent(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot snapshot)
      Extracts necessary data from snapshot to create an instance of Event.
      Parameters:
      snapshot - Document read from Firestore database with Event.accessEvent() data.
      Returns:
      Event object with appropriate attributes

    • setEventCapacity

      public void setEventCapacity(int eventCapacity)
      Set an attendee limit capacity for the Event.
      > 0 : to enable capacity
      = 0 : to disable capacity
      Parameters:
      eventCapacity - Maximum amount of attendees of the Event
